name: Catchcoin™
description: catchcoin™ is a Web3-powered rewards platform that connects real-world businesses with consumers through Augmented Reality and blockchain technology. Our platform turns cities into interactive spaces where users can explore, discover local businesses, and unlock instant rewards in the form of cash, tokens, and exclusive offers. Businesses benefit from increased foot traffic, transparent marketing, and a new way to engage with customers, while users enjoy a fun, gamified experience that transforms everyday exploration into real financial incentives. With catchcoin™, we’re building the future of retail rewards by combining AR, Web3, and decentralized promotions.
